forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Slight chance of a rain shower. High around 15C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 58F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and wind. Low near 10C. Winds SE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.

forecastday.title: Friday

forecastday.title: Friday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. Low 51F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High near 55F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 9C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 49F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then becoming windy with a steady rain in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm. Winds could occasionally gust over 65 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then becoming windy with a steady rain in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch. Winds could occasionally gust over 40 mph.
